attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let the government take control of the legal requirement to have vehicle insurance. Take away control from private companies to set costs and profit margins. The country would gain financially, at no or perhaps, less extra cost to motorists. There would be no potential job losses in the insurance industry as staff could possibly transfer to the new employer.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
